title: Quarantine Damaged Stock
description: A warehouse worker damages a pallet of goods with a forklift. The damaged items must be quarantined and removed from sellable inventory.

tasks.description: The worker reports the incident and the damaged items.
Move the damaged items to a designated quarantine area in the warehouse.
Adjust the inventory record, moving the damaged quantity from 'sellable' to 'quarantined/damaged' status.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the inventory status for the items.
